name: Association of Charity Lotteries in Europe
goal: To promote the interests of charity lotteries and their beneficiaries in Europe.
interests: Climate Action, Competition, Culture, Employment and Social Affairs, Environment, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, International co-operation and development, Public Health, Single market, Sport, Youth
euInitiatives: Gambling and lottery related initiatives, fundraising via lotteries, advertising rules, audio visual media services directive, anti-money laundering
